Protocols/PendingBindingSession.html#/s:.name: activateBinding(otp:completion:)
Protocols/PendingBindingSession.html#/s:.abstract: Activate Binding with or without OTP. If OTP is provided, the TMGSDK will call the server to validate it.

Protocols/DeviceAuthenticationDelegate.h.name: DeviceAuthenticationDelegate
Protocols/DeviceAuthenticationDelegate.h.abstract: DeviceAuthenticationDelegate Call back for App to initiate the user authentication.

Protocols/PendingBindingSession.html.name: PendingBindingSession
Protocols/PendingBindingSession.html.abstract: PendingBindingSession is used to get vProvisionedTokenId session details with pending activation.

Protocols/VisaCTFHelper.html.name: VisaCTFHelper
Protocols/VisaCTFHelper.html.abstract: VisaCTFHelper is used to authenticate and bind vProvisionedTokenId with the device.

Enums/BindingState.html#/s:6TMGSDK12Bind.name: bound
Enums/BindingState.html#/s:6TMGSDK12Bind.abstract: Returned when vProvisionedTokenId is bounded with the device.

Enums/BindingState.html#/s:6TMGSDK12Bind.name: pendingActivation
Enums/BindingState.html#/s:6TMGSDK12Bind.abstract: Returned when activation is pending for the vProvisionedTokenId.

Enums/BindingState.html#/s:6TMGSDK12Bind.name: declined
Enums/BindingState.html#/s:6TMGSDK12Bind.abstract: Returned when vProvisionedTokenId is declined with the device.

Enums/BindingState.html#/s:6TMGSDK12Bind.name: unbound
Enums/BindingState.html#/s:6TMGSDK12Bind.abstract: Returned when vProvisionedTokenId is not bounded with the device.

Enums/TMGError.html#/s:6TMGSDK8TMGErrorO.name: tokenNotBound
Enums/TMGError.html#/s:6TMGSDK8TMGErrorO.abstract: Returned when the provided token is not bounded with the device.

Enums/TMGError.html#/s:6TMGSDK8TMGErrorO.name: tokenUnbound
Enums/TMGError.html#/s:6TMGSDK8TMGErrorO.abstract: Returned when the provided token is in unbound state.

Enums/TMGError.html#/s:6TMGSDK8TMGErrorO.name: tokenPending
Enums/TMGError.html#/s:6TMGSDK8TMGErrorO.abstract: Returned when the provided token is in pending state.

Enums/TMGError.html#/s:6TMGSDK8TMGErrorO.name: tokenDeclined
Enums/TMGError.html#/s:6TMGSDK8TMGErrorO.abstract: Returned when the provided token is in declined state.

Enums/TMGError.html#/s:6TMGSDK8TMGErrorO.name: tokenActive
Enums/TMGError.html#/s:6TMGSDK8TMGErrorO.abstract: Returned when the provided token is in active state.

Enums/TMGError.html#/s:6TMGSDK8TMGErrorO.name: invalidConfigParams
Enums/TMGError.html#/s:6TMGSDK8TMGErrorO.abstract: Returned when some of the TMGClientConfiguration parameter is invalid.

Enums/TMGError.html#/s:6TMGSDK8TMGErrorO.name: invalidRequiredParams
Enums/TMGError.html#/s:6TMGSDK8TMGErrorO.abstract: Returned when some of the mandatory parameters on this API is invalid.

Enums/TMGError.html#/s:6TMGSDK8TMGErrorO.name: invalidIdvMethod
Enums/TMGError.html#/s:6TMGSDK8TMGErrorO.abstract: Returned when the provided IDV method is invalid.

Enums/TMGError.html#/s:6TMGSDK8TMGErrorO.name: invalidOTPMessage
Enums/TMGError.html#/s:6TMGSDK8TMGErrorO.abstract: Returned when the provided OTP is invalid.

Enums/TMGError.html#/s:6TMGSDK8TMGErrorO.name: issuerAuthenticationRequired
Enums/TMGError.html#/s:6TMGSDK8TMGErrorO.abstract: Returned when the issuer authentication is required. Use PendingBindingSession.submitIdvMethod(...).

Enums/TMGError.html#/s:6TMGSDK8TMGErrorO.name: biometricNotSupported
Enums/TMGError.html#/s:6TMGSDK8TMGErrorO.abstract: Returned when the biometric is not enrolled on the device.

Enums/TMGError.html#/s:6TMGSDK8TMGErrorO.name: authenticationFailure(reason:)
Enums/TMGError.html#/s:6TMGSDK8TMGErrorO.abstract: Returned when the user authentication is failing. Check the reason message for the error.

Enums/TMGError.html#/s:6TMGSDK8TMGErrorO.name: internalError(additionalMessage:)
Enums/TMGError.html#/s:6TMGSDK8TMGErrorO.abstract: Returned when there’s an internal error. Check additional message for the error.

Enums/TMGError.html#/s:6TMGSDK8TMGErrorO.name: deviceEnvironmentUnsafe(code:)
Enums/TMGError.html#/s:6TMGSDK8TMGErrorO.abstract: Returned when the device environment is potentially unsafe. Check the obfuscated error code for the error.

Enums/TMGError.html#/s:6TMGSDK8TMGErrorO.name: serverIsNotAccessible
Enums/TMGError.html#/s:6TMGSDK8TMGErrorO.abstract: Returned when the server is not accesible due to network connection issue.

Enums/TMGError.html#/s:6TMGSDK8TMGErrorO.name: serverRetryable
Enums/TMGError.html#/s:6TMGSDK8TMGErrorO.abstract: Returned when the server is unable to handle the current request due to a temporary overloading or maintenance of the server.

Enums/TMGError.html#/s:6TMGSDK8TMGErrorO.name: serverError(httpStatusCode:additionalMessage:)
Enums/TMGError.html#/s:6TMGSDK8TMGErrorO.abstract: Returned when there’s a server error. Check the HTTP status code for the error and the additional message; if any.

Enums/TMGError.html#/s:6TMGSDK8TMGErrorO.name: serverErrorTooManyRequest
Enums/TMGError.html#/s:6TMGSDK8TMGErrorO.abstract: Returned when there are too many requests on the server. Please try it again later.

Enums/TMGError.html#/s:6TMGSDK8TMGErrorO.name: serverErrorCryptoError
Enums/TMGError.html#/s:6TMGSDK8TMGErrorO.abstract: Returned when there’s an error when performing crypto operation on the server.

Enums/TMGError.html#/s:6TMGSDK8TMGErrorO.name: serverErrorInvalidTokenState
Enums/TMGError.html#/s:6TMGSDK8TMGErrorO.abstract: Returned when the token state is invalid.

Enums/TMGError.html#/s:6TMGSDK8TMGErrorO.name: serverErrorIdvNotAvailable
Enums/TMGError.html#/s:6TMGSDK8TMGErrorO.abstract: Returned when the end user selects an IDV method that is not available.

Enums/TMGError.html#/s:6TMGSDK8TMGErrorO.name: serverErrorNoSessionFound
Enums/TMGError.html#/s:6TMGSDK8TMGErrorO.abstract: Returned when the session cannot be found.

Enums/TMGError.html#/s:6TMGSDK8TMGErrorO.name: serverErrorWrongOTP
Enums/TMGError.html#/s:6TMGSDK8TMGErrorO.abstract: Returned when the end user key in the wrong otp.

Enums/TMGError.html#/s:6TMGSDK8TMGErrorO.name: serverErrorExpiredOTP
Enums/TMGError.html#/s:6TMGSDK8TMGErrorO.abstract: Returned when the end user enters an expired OTP.

Enums/TMGError.html#/s:6TMGSDK8TMGErrorO.name: serverErrorRetryLimitExceeded
Enums/TMGError.html#/s:6TMGSDK8TMGErrorO.abstract: Returned when the end user exceeds the number of retries allowed.

Enums/TMGError.html#/s:6TMGSDK8TMGErrorO.name: errorDescription
Enums/TMGError.html#/s:6TMGSDK8TMGErrorO.abstract: Returned the error description.

Enums/IdvType.html#/s:6TMGSDK7IdvTypeO8o.name: otpEmail
Enums/IdvType.html#/s:6TMGSDK7IdvTypeO8o.abstract: This code is used when the user opts OTP through mail for verification.

Enums/IdvType.html#/s:6TMGSDK7IdvTypeO6o.name: otpSms
Enums/IdvType.html#/s:6TMGSDK7IdvTypeO6o.abstract: This code is used when the user opts OTP through SMS for verification.

Enums/IdvType.html#/s:6TMGSDK7IdvTypeO16.name: otpOnlineBanking
Enums/IdvType.html#/s:6TMGSDK7IdvTypeO16.abstract: This code is used when the user opts OTP through online banking for verification.

Enums/IdvType.html#/s:6TMGSDK7IdvTypeO8a.name: appToApp
Enums/IdvType.html#/s:6TMGSDK7IdvTypeO8a.abstract: This code is used when the user opts app to app for verification.

Enums/IdvType.html#/s:6TMGSDK7IdvTypeO15.name: customerService
Enums/IdvType.html#/s:6TMGSDK7IdvTypeO15.abstract: This code is used when the user opts customer service for verification.

Enums/IdvType.html#/s:6TMGSDK7IdvTypeO12.name: outboundCall
Enums/IdvType.html#/s:6TMGSDK7IdvTypeO12.abstract: This code is used when the user opts outbound call for verification.

Enums/TMGError.html.name: TMGError
Enums/TMGError.html.abstract: Error object that returned when there’s something wrong in the process.

Enums/BindingState.html.name: BindingState
Enums/BindingState.html.abstract: BindingState defines the current state of the vProvisionedTokenId.

Classes/TMGClientConfiguration/Builder.h.name: init(serverUrl:serverCertificate:serverKeyId:certificatePins:)
Classes/TMGClientConfiguration/Builder.h.abstract: Initializing the tmgUrl, certificate, key identifier and certificate pins for Builder

Classes/TMGClientConfiguration.html#/s:6.name: init(builder:)
Classes/TMGClientConfiguration.html#/s:6.abstract: Configure the server url, certificate, key identifier, key identifier and certificate pins

Classes/TMGClient.html#/s:6TMGSDK9TMGCli.name: createVisaCTFHelper(tmgClientConfiguration:completion:)
Classes/TMGClient.html#/s:6TMGSDK9TMGCli.abstract: Creates Visa Token Binding Client with the given configuration.

Classes/OtpActivationStatus.html#/s:6TMG.name: maxOtpRequestsAllowed
Classes/OtpActivationStatus.html#/s:6TMG.abstract: Only provided if the selected IdvMethod contains an OTP. The number of retries a consumer can enter OTP before they must request a new one.

Classes/OtpActivationStatus.html#/s:6TMG.name: maxOtpVerificationAllowed
Classes/OtpActivationStatus.html#/s:6TMG.abstract: Only provided if the selected IdvMethod contains an OTP. The number of times the consumer can request a new OTP for a token. After the number of attempts is exceeded, step up authentication via OTP is disabled for this token.

Classes/OtpActivationStatus.html#/s:6TMG.name: otpExpiration
Classes/OtpActivationStatus.html#/s:6TMG.abstract: Only provided if the selected IdvMethod contains an OTP. OTP validation will fail if the consumer submits OTP after this period. The value is set in minutes.

Classes/IdvMethod.html#/s:6TMGSDK9IdvMet.name: type
Classes/IdvMethod.html#/s:6TMGSDK9IdvMet.abstract: A type of IdvMethod that user could select.

Classes/IdvMethod.html#/s:6TMGSDK9IdvMet.name: value
Classes/IdvMethod.html#/s:6TMGSDK9IdvMet.abstract: Only for IdvType.appToApp. It corresponds to the concatenation of the issuer application id and the intent handler.

Classes/IdvMethod.html#/s:6TMGSDK9IdvMet.name: source
Classes/IdvMethod.html#/s:6TMGSDK9IdvMet.abstract: Only for appToApp. It corresponds to the concatenation of the issuer application id and the intent handler.

Classes/IdvMethod.html#/s:6TMGSDK9IdvMet.name: requestPayload
Classes/IdvMethod.html#/s:6TMGSDK9IdvMet.abstract: Only for appToApp. An opaque data that should be sent to the issuer application

Classes/DeviceAuthenticatorChecker.html#.name: isBiometricSupported()
Classes/DeviceAuthenticatorChecker.html#.abstract: An utility to check if the Biometric can be supported as an authentication method for the current Device.

Classes/DeviceAuthenticatorChecker.html.name: DeviceAuthenticatorChecker
Classes/DeviceAuthenticatorChecker.html.abstract: DeviceAuthenticationChecker used to check what kind of authentication the device supports.

Classes/IdvMethod.html.name: IdvMethod
Classes/IdvMethod.html.abstract: IdvMethod defines the IDV method available to the end user

Classes/OtpActivationStatus.html.name: OtpActivationStatus
Classes/OtpActivationStatus.html.abstract: OtpActivationStatus to capture otp status during submitIdvMethod and send back to applications.

Classes/TMGClient.html.name: TMGClient
Classes/TMGClient.html.abstract: TMGClient is used to create the VisaCTFHelper object

Classes/TMGClientConfiguration.html.name: TMGClientConfiguration
Classes/TMGClientConfiguration.html.abstract: TMGClientConfiguration used to configure the Server URL, Server certificate, Key identifier and Certificate pins
